Description: This creature has little time left now.
ChangeDescriptionText: 7|The beast is strong. Its blood pumps thick and hard.~6|The beast's body thrashes in agony.~5|The beast's blood blackens. Viscous. Oily.~4|The beast's pulse weakens. It has little time left.~3|The beast moans. It barely has the energy to quiver.~0|The beast is silent. Its pain is over.~2|The beast shakes, mewling for the end.~1|The beast's final heartbeats pound their last.
Name: $Gant Pole -> ギャント・ポール$Gant Pole: Final Breaths
